description:
Implementation of stack for items, using dynamic collections.

Entries in the stack must be structured items - that is, either JSON Objects or Arrays, or XML Nodes.

functions.name: copy
functions.signature: ($destName as xs:QName, $sourceName as xs:QName) as empty-sequence()
functions.description:
Copy all items from source stack to a destination stack.

If destination stack does not exist, it is created first.

If destination stack is not empty, the items are appended on top.
functions.summary: Copy all items from source stack to a destination stack.

parameters.name: destName
parameters.description: name of the destination stack.

parameters.name: sourceName
parameters.description: name of the source stack.

functions.name: create
functions.description: Create a stack with this name. If stack exists, an error is raised.
functions.summary: Create a stack with this name.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: name of the new stack.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">stack:EXISTS if the stack identified by $name already exists.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: empty
functions.description: Checks if a stack exists and is empty.
functions.summary: Checks if a stack exists and is empty.

returns.description: true if the stack is empty or does not exist.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">stack:NOT-EXISTS if the stack identified by $name does not exist.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: pop
functions.description: Return the top item in the stack, and remove it.
functions.summary: Return the top item in the stack, and remove it.

returns.description: the top item, or empty sequence if stack is empty.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">stack:NOT-EXISTS if the stack identified by $name does not exist.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: push
functions.signature: ($name as xs:QName, $value as structured-item()) as empty-sequence()
functions.description: Add a new item to the stack; the stack will contain a copy of the given item.
functions.summary: Add a new item to the stack; the stack will contain a copy of the given item.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: the item to be added.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">stack:NOT-EXISTS if the stack identified by $name does not exist.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: size
functions.description: Count of items in the stack.
functions.summary: Count of items in the stack.
errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">stack:NOT-EXISTS if the stack identified by $name does not exist.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: top
functions.description: Return the top item in the stack, without removing it.
functions.summary: Return the top item in the stack, without removing it.

returns.description: the top item, or empty sequence if stack is empty.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">stack:NOT-EXISTS if the stack identified by $name does not exist.</xqdoc:error>
